channel.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
channel.description:
This is a topic to discuss favorite [url=http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/]Firefox[/url] [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/recommended]add-ons[/url] and [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/browse/type:2]themes[/url]. Whether you like the [url=http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/]original Firefox theme[/url], or some extremely tacky one like [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1542]PimpZilla[/url], share it with us. You like to use [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/16]ChatZilla[/url] while you browse? Tell us about it.
I only have a couple of rules on this thread. These include:
[b]1.[/b] [b][u]NO[/u][/b] spamming or flaming. (e.g. "Firefox sucks, your all gay IE is the best, noobs this theme is the best." Any type of spamming or flaming will be immediately reported. [b]2.[/b] You [u][b]MUST[/b][/u] be a Firefox user to be able to use these add-ons and themes. [b]3.[/b] You must try to discuss why you like that add-on or theme. [b]4.[/b] Use good grammar and spelling please. If your grammar isn't very good, or your spelling is a bit off, use Firefox's spell check tool.
To get to the topic. I really enjoy using the [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1315]iFox graphite[/url] theme, [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865]Adblock Plus[/url], and [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/16]ChatZilla[/url] and [url=http://fasterfox.mozdev.org/]FasterFox[/url].
[url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1315]iFox graphite[/url] is very elegant, giving it the look and feel of the expertly made GUI that it is, [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865]Adblock Plus[/url] gets rid of the pesky ads that slow down your browsing experience, and [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/16]ChatZilla[/url] really allows me to IRC on the go, and [url=http://fasterfox.mozdev.org/]FasterFox[/url] makes my Firefox browsing experience every bit better.

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I really don’t like the RedShift themes. It’s too dark.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Redshift V2 (theme) because I think it is sexy (haha…)

Gspace (Gmail space) because it helps free up memory on my laptop.

Firebug (Web developer helper thing) because it lets me see more of a page’s code than just “view page source”.

I think I will have to check out that fastfox thing you guys are talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @cheese939 cheese939
item.description:
@cheese939 wrote:

Pookey71:

I just some random theme, some download bar shit and nothing else, firefox isn’t spoused to be loaded with shit.

Neither were you, but well…
Anyways, i have:
FoxyTunes - Control your music playing from itunes, wmp etc. (24 players) from Firefox, saves alot of added up time opening player to change song

Ad-block plus (with filter.g) - Ad block blocks advertisements on pages, filter.g adds 1000 or so preset blocks for it.

Unplug - just like video downloader, downloads media on page, prefer it to videodownloader which i also have.

1337key - converts normal text to: 1337, binary, morse code, ROT13, hexadecimal and more.

ChatZilla Just an IRC client

Fasterfox - Speeds up firefox

Downthemall - download manager, even though i use Free Download Manager software

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

I used to use RedShift V2, but I think I’m using Blue Ice now or something similar

I lub CoolIris, you hover your cursor over a link, a blue box pops up, you hover over that, and it shows you the page… It’s hard to explain, “Wouldn’t it be easier to open a new link?” No.

I also have AdBlock (<3 Ron), seems to help alot.

And FastFox, it speeds up browsing significantly,

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @Icy_Inferno Icy Inferno
item.description:
@Icy_Inferno wrote:

uncfan1119:

the adblocker thing

Please follow the thread rules.

[quote=“Inching Away, post:1, topic:121046”]I only have a couple of rules on this thread. These include:

1. NO spamming or flaming. (e.g. “Firefox sucks, your all gay IE is the best, noobs this theme is the best.” Any type of spamming or flaming will be immediately reported.
2. You MUST be a Firefox user to be able to use these add-ons and themes.
3. You must try to discuss why you like that add-on or theme.
4. Use good grammar and spelling please. If your grammar isn’t very good, or your spelling is a bit off, use Firefox’s spell check tool.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

I’ve got FireFTP, ChatZilla and FoxyTunes

FireFtp, because I needed a FTP client
ChatZilla, because I wanted to irc with FireFox
and FoxyTunes, because I wanted to listen to music without any extra windows

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

Pookey71:

I just some random theme, some download bar shit and nothing else, firefox isn’t spoused to be loaded with shit.

It’s not, but it’s made to suit every persons needs.

[quote=“Casey., post:3, topic:121046”]I use a cool red and black skin(can post name later, on desktop)
I have chatzillar, but have yet to use…
And addblockplus.

PWNS IE![/quote]

You’re probably using RedShift V1/V2. I’m trying it out now. Here’s a screeny:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:4, topic:121046”]I’m currently using Metal Lion - Vista theme, although I like to use Blue Ice. Very sleek.

Download status bar
FireFTP
FootieFox[/quote]

Never tried anything you’ve used except the download status bar, and FireFTP.

item.title: Favorite Firefox add-ons/themes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This is a topic to discuss favorite Firefox add-ons and themes. Whether you like the original Firefox theme, or some extremely tacky one like PimpZilla, share it with us. You like to use ChatZilla while you browse? Tell us about it.

I only have a couple of rules on this thread. These include:

1. NO spamming or flaming. (e.g. “Firefox sucks, your all gay IE is the best, noobs this theme is the best.” Any type of spamming or flaming will be immediately reported.
2. You MUST be a Firefox user to be able to use these add-ons and themes.
3. You must try to discuss why you like that add-on or theme.
4. Use good grammar and spelling please. If your grammar isn’t very good, or your spelling is a bit off, use Firefox’s spell check tool.

To get to the topic. I really enjoy using the iFox graphite theme, Adblock Plus, and ChatZilla and FasterFox.

iFox graphite is very elegant, giving it the look and feel of the expertly made GUI that it is, Adblock Plus gets rid of the pesky ads that slow down your browsing experience, and ChatZilla really allows me to IRC on the go, and FasterFox makes my Firefox browsing experience every bit better.

Read full topic
